content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_shell" command to run the "df -h && ls -l" command, which returned information on the available disk space and a list of files in the current directory. Additionally, I received a message from the AI to write to a file named "atlas_notes.txt" using the "write_to_file" command, which I successfully executed and received confirmation that the file was written to. The file contained notes written by Atlas on June 10, 2023.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "how to use numpy in python"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/quickstart.html", "https://www.w3schools.com/python/numpy/numpy_intro.asp", "https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/absolute_beginners.html", "https://www.dataquest.io/blog/numpy-tutorial-python/", "https://numpy.org/", "https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/numpy-in-python-set-1-introduction/", "https://www.w3schools.com/python/numpy/numpy_creating_arrays.asp", "https://www.activestate.com/resources/quick-reads/how-to-import-numpy-in-python/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
